sentences.en: Do not overfeed them, as this will encourage soft sappy growth.
sentences.cn: 不要给它们施肥过多，以防其长得柔软多汁。

sentences.en: Feed plants to encourage steady growth.
sentences.cn: 给植物施肥促使其不断生长。

sentences.en: How can faculty improve their teaching so as to encourage creativity?
sentences.cn: 教师们如何才能改进教学以激发创造性呢？

sentences.en: I encourage oboe and clarinet players to use plenty of vibrato.
sentences.cn: 我鼓励演奏双簧管和单簧管的乐手们多使用颤音。

sentences.en: I want to thank everyone who has encouraged and supported me.
sentences.cn: 我要感谢每一位鼓励和支持过我的人。

sentences.en: The idea is to encourage people to get to know their neighbours.
sentences.cn: 其目的是促使人们结识邻居。

sentences.en: The paper'sprice rise will encourage readers to desert in even greater numbers.
sentences.cn: 报纸价格的上涨将导致更多的读者不再订阅。

sentences.en: There are easier ways to encourage the even spread of wealth.
sentences.cn: 有一些更简单的方法可以促进财富的平均分配。

sentences.en: This is no way to encourage a love of literature.
sentences.cn: 靠这种办法想激起对文学的热爱是行不通的。

sentences.en: Various inducements are offered to encourage employees to wear safety clothing.
sentences.cn: 他们提供各种奖励以鼓励员工穿安全服。

sentences.en: Violent TV programmes encourage anti-social behaviour.
sentences.cn: 暴力的电视节目助长反社会行为。

sentences.en: What can be done to encourage convicted offenders to change their ways?
sentences.cn: 怎样才能激励这些罪犯洗心革面呢？

sentences.en: You should encourage your child's attempts at self-expression.
sentences.cn: 对孩子表达自我的尝试，你应当加以鼓励。
